definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

sentences.english: Unique see-through-window & lighting device for easy monitoring.
sentences.chinese: 独到的视明窗及照明设备，检视功能，事半功倍。

sentences.english: When we exam the brand, you will see Mercedes-Benz actually is a contributor to auto safety.
sentences.chinese: 作为老牌的汽车企业，奔驰在安全领域有独到的声望。

sentences.english: There’s nothing fancy here but there is really good food that is very reasonably priced.
sentences.chinese: 这里无什么独到之处，但确实是有标价便宜的美食呢。

sentences.english: Unique Packaging, a highly visual sourcebook, shows the contemporary work of important international package designers.
sentences.chinese: 每一件作品都有设计师的独到见解和设计思路。

sentences.english: Three of Us has many original in art.
sentences.chinese: 《我们仨》在艺术上也有许多独到之处。

sentences.english: Yihe was amiable to everyone, very expansive, erudite, possessing remarkable view.
sentences.chinese: 一禾待人平易，非常健谈，学识渊博，见解独到。

sentences.english: She has an amazing eye for style.
sentences.chinese: 她对时尚有着独到的眼光。

sentences.english: Qinghui Garden is one of Guangdong's four famous classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 清晖园为广东四大名园之一，园中有其独到的妙处。

sentences.english: Jiang Kui who has the original attainments in the poetry creation aspect is also well-known by Ci.
sentences.chinese: 以词闻名的姜夔在诗歌创作方面也有独到的造诣。

sentences.english: Forming your own opinion is important.
sentences.chinese: 因此，形成自己的独到见解至关重要。

sentences.english: Lot’s of insightful tips and tricks to learn.
sentences.chinese: 可以学到大量独到的建议和窍门。

sentences.english: Gaoxu had special view on western culture.
sentences.chinese: 高旭对西方文化的见解，具有独到之处。

sentences.english: Sun Li is a well-recognized Chinese pioneering editor with the following remarkable insights.
sentences.chinese: 孙犁是一位卓有成绩的，具有独到见解的编辑家。

sentences.english: Although this is a folk legend, but the spring is not the old Baoding indeed unique.
sentences.chinese: 这虽是民间传说，但保定的春不老确实有独到之处。

sentences.english: Wang Anyi has formed unique understanding about secular urban novels.
sentences.chinese: 对于城市世俗生活，王安忆形成了自己的独到见解。

sentences.english: The instructor at a recent session asked the participants to explain Steve Jobs's distinguishing talent.
sentences.chinese: 最近一堂课中，导师让参与者解释乔布斯的独到之处。

definition: lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
to blaze a new trail (idiom); to display originality
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
having a unique or distinctive style
out of the ordinary/out of the common run
